alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of Oklahoma, southwestern Lincoln, northern Cleveland and southeastern Logan Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 444 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Meridian to near Edmond to near Oklahoma City. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, northern Norman, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Chandler, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Luther, Wellston, Valley Brook, Carney, Arcadia, Warwick, and Fallis. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 115 and 147. Interstate 40 between mile markers 146 and 172. Interstate 44 between mile markers 111 and 121, and between mile markers 125 and 167. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
